name: Beat_Machine
description:
Beat_Machine puts the hottest drum kits and samples at your fingertips.

Beat_Machine is a fun & creative drum pad machine. Play cool & hot drumbeats, cool dj add lips and other sound effects. Create your own hit beats. Jam directly on your iOS device. Plug in your headphones and enjoy the sounds & music.

Many different drum set to choose from and an easy-to-use design makes this app real fun for everyone.

Use the easy-to-use, but powerful pattern sequencer to record, edit and save your Sessions.
